questions.content: What's the craziest excuse you have had an employee/coworker tell you showing up late to work?
questions.author: Joe S.
questions.notes: A few days ago, my sister said she had a flat tire, which delayed her commute to work by two hours.

questions.author: Steve J.
questions.notes: I am looking for some great apps.

questions.content: What is the best way to stand out against other job applicants?
questions.author: Barbara V.
questions.notes: Currently job hunting, want to know your tips.
